services.name: automated-annotation
services.description: Automated annotation service using LangChain for knowledge extraction and text annotation

endpoints.description: Classify bag model using vector-based similarity search (image vector from image). Returns model, model_id, root_model, root_model_id, and confidence.

body.image: string (required) - Processing/Image ID stored in the image-processing DynamoDB table. Signed image URL will be looked up automatically.
body.brand: string (required) - Brand namespace for Pinecone (e.g., 'jacquemus'). Uses 7 nearest neighbors by default

endpoints.description: Classify a bag property (type, material, colour, etc.) using the DSL orchestrator. For model/material, returns simplified response with only essential fields.

body.image: string (required) - Processing/Image ID. Signed image URL will be looked up automatically from annotation-data-service-layer.
body.text_dump: string (required) - Textual description/context used for classification
body.brand: string (optional) - Brand context passed to the classifier
body.resolve_names: boolean (optional) - Include resolved names in response

endpoints.description: Health check endpoint for the automated annotation service

services.name: image-service
services.description: Image service for managing image uploads, processing status, and processed image URLs

endpoints.description: Generate a presigned URL for uploading images

body.filename: string (required) - Original filename of the image
body.contentType: string (optional) - MIME type of the image
body.expiresIn: number (optional) - URL expiration time in seconds (default: 3600)

endpoints.description: Generate a presigned URL for uploading images (query params)

query.filename: string (required) - Original filename of the image
query.contentType: string (optional) - MIME type of the image
query.expiresIn: number (optional) - URL expiration time in seconds (default: 3600)

endpoints.description: Get processing status for an image

path.processingId: string (required) - Processing ID returned from upload

query.status: string (optional) - Filter by processing status (uploaded, processing, completed, failed)
query.lastKey: string (optional) - Pagination token for next page

endpoints.description: Get processed image URLs for a specific upload

path.uniqueId: string (required) - Unique ID returned from upload

endpoints.description: Manually trigger processing for an uploaded image

path.uniqueId: string (required) - Unique ID returned from upload

endpoints.description: Delete an image and all its processed versions

path.uniqueId: string (required) - Unique ID returned from upload

endpoints.description: Health check endpoint for the image service
